resources.string: It has been detected that the position switch of your mobile phone is not turned on. To ensure the normal operation of the application, please turn on the position switch.
Press Again To Exit The Program

Thank you for trusting and using FitRing. 

 We will help you to understand our collection, use and storage of your personal information and your relevant rights according to the User Privacy Agreement. 

 When you use the FitRing app, we will collect your device information, personal information (avatar, nickname, height, weight, exercise data) and other information. We need to get your camera permissions, photo album permissions to upload your app avatar: 

 When you use the FitRing application to run outdoors, upload, share and store exercise information, we need to obtain your location permissions and other purposes to record your running track. 

 You can access, modify, delete your personal information or manage your authorization in the relevant pages. 

 We use industry-leading security technology to protect your personal information. 

 When you click "OK", you agree to the terms of this Agreement.
